transcript: All right, but Don't go thinkin' like that because otherwise what did we work for? I mean the whole thing is for you Chris the whole shooting matches for you

segments.text: Don't go thinkin' like that because otherwise what did we work for? I mean the whole thing is for you Chris the whole shooting matches for you

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: All right, but just don't go thinkin' like that 'cause otherwise what did we work for?  I mean, the whole thing is for you, Chris.  The whole shootin' match is for you.
